subject: Your unclaimed Funds Payment
body:
Dear  Filomena,   

Thanks for your prompt response of Wed, Feb 07 , 2024. The contents of your mail are noted too,I have been having issues with my previous emails hence I had to resend this again. 
    1.    This matter is basically about funds recovered and rescued and now domiciled with a prime bank in the United States                               America.The funds were recovered by Ecowas and duly placed in a suspense account .I have contacted you because we are                       consultants to several government in Africa,Europe and Ecowas.
    2.    There will be no need of your continuing with the communication if you do not have any outstanding funds within West Africa.                 The Ecowas countries are Benin · Burkina Faso · Cabo Verde · Côte d'Ivoire · The Gambia · Ghana · Guinea · Guinea Bissau ·                     Liberia · Mali · Niger · Nigeria (In alphabetical order).So if you have your funds trapped or unclaimed in any or more of these                       Ecowas countries or Europe do send me more details to enable us assist you with your payment.

    3.    Our mandate is to liaise with owners and beneficiaries of funds and make sure that they receive their long over due and unclaimed           funds and we have the mandate to also help the beneficiary to recover any money he or she has lost in his or her pursuits of the               unclaimed funds.
    4.    Upon your confirmation of having outstanding or unclaimed funds within the Ecowas/West Africa countries,we will continue this             communication and I will provide you with further details and my identity.
    5.    You are to send me your full details,including address,telephone number and a copy of your identification to enable us start the               process of payment.
I await your reply.

Yours Faithfully,
Jacob AdjirackorTotem Financial Services Ltd.JR92+7X3,Odum Close North Dzorwulu, Greater Accra-Ghana

subject: Re: Your unclaimed Funds Payment
body:
Dear Jacob Financial Services,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to assist with the recovery of funds. However, I have a few questions before proceeding further.

1. How exactly did Ecowas recover these funds? Can you provide more details about the process?

2. What is the purpose of the suspense account in the prime bank? Why are the funds being held there?

3. Are there any fees or charges involved in this process? If so, what are they and how are they calculated?

4. Can you provide some examples or references of individuals or organizations that have successfully received their long overdue and unclaimed funds through your services?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Filomena

subject: Re: Hello
body:

    3.    Our mandate is to liaise with owners and beneficiaries of funds and make sure that they receive their long over due and unclaimed           funds and we have the mandate to also help the beneficiary to recover any money he or she has lost in his or her pursuits of the               unclaimed funds.
    4.    Upon your confirmation of having outstanding or unclaimed funds within the Ecowas/West Africa countries,we will continue this             communication and I will provide you with further details and my identity.
    5.    You are to send me your full details,including address,telephone number and a copy of your identification to enable us start the               process of payment.
I await your reply.


Jacob AdjirackorTotem Financial Services Ltd.JR92+7X3,Odum Close North Dzorwulu, Greater Accra-Ghana

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Dear Jacob Financial Services,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the funds recovered and rescued by Ecowas. I appreciate the information you have provided. Can you please clarify how exactly my funds may have ended up in one of the Ecowas countries or Europe? 

Additionally, could you explain more about the process of verifying and claiming these funds? I would like to understand the steps involved before proceeding further.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Filomena
